text: Taba unakō samudāyakō nāyakalē jō kāphira thi'ē, spaṣṭasaṅga bhannathālēḥ ki yō ta timī jastai mānisa hō, timīmāthi śrēṣṭhatā prāpta garna cāhancha ra yadi allāhalē cāhēkō bha'ē kunai phariśtāharūlā'ī (svargadūtaharūlā'ī) paṭhā'unē thiyō. Hāmīlē ta āphnō pūrvajaharūbāṭa yō kurā kahilyai pani sunēnauṁ
